info.title: Orders API
info.description: APIs used for interacting with orders.

post.description:
Generates information for the checkout page including taxes, totals, and shipping price.
      This endpoint will return up-to-date price. If the price changed, the user should be notified.
      The returned inventory is always equal to the requested quantity, and it is not reserved.
      Inventory check will be done at the time of order placement only.
Submits an order to Bonsai for processing. Be careful as these orders will be processed unless Bonsai gets contacted to cancel!

example.title: Authentication information is missing or invalid

UnauthorizedError.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid

address1.description: The street address of the shipping address.

address2.description: An optional additional field for the street address of the shipping address.

city.description: The city, town, or village of the shipping address.

country.description: The two-letter code (ISO 3166-1 format) for the country of the shipping address.

province.description: The two-letter abbreviation of the region of the shipping address.

phone.description: The phone number at the shipping address.

zip.description: The postal code (zip, postcode, Eircode, …) of the shipping address.

quantity.description: Quantity of the product variant in the cart

target_currency.description: The currency to return values in.

subtotal.description: The price of all products in the cart, in target currency (ex. USD).

tax.description: The amount of taxes to be paid, in target currency (ex. USD).

amount.description: The amount of shipping services to be paid, in dollars.

label.description: Label to show to the user to indicate the shipping type.

code.description: Code that indicates the shipping type.

total.description: The total amount for the order, in target currency (ex. USD).

duties.description: The total amount of duties for the order, in target currency (ex. USD).

variant_id.description: The ID of the product variant.

inventory.description: Available inventory for the order. If the inventory is 0, the product is out of stock.

quantity.description: Purchase quantity requested from the endpoint

currency.description: Currency that values are returned in.

shipping_total.description: Total amount of shipping costs, in target currency (ex. USD).

variant_id.description: The ID of the product variant.

quantity.description: Purchase quantity requested from the endpoint

currency.description: Currency that values are returned in.

shipping_total.description: Total amount of shipping costs, in target currency (ex. USD).

id.description: Unique identifier for error. Can be used for tracing across services.

title.description: Short description what the error entails.
title.example: The product requested is no longer available

detail.description: Useful details related to the error

taxes.description: The amount of taxes to be paid, in target currency (ex. USD).

tax.description: Taxes for a specific shipping line.

currency.description: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the order currency.

value.description: The information to be stored as metadata.

value_type.description: The metafield information type. Valid values: string, integer, json_string.

namespace.description: A container for a set of metafields.

variant_id.description: The ID of the product variant.

price.description: The price of the item before discounts have been applied in the shop currency.

quantity.description: The number of items that were purchased.

currency.description: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the order currency.

token.description: A unique token for the order.

code.description: The discount code that customers use at checkout.

total_tax.description: Total amount of taxes to be paid.

partner_id.description: This is the public ID of the partner that the sale will be attributed to.

incrementalId.description: Send an order number if needed.
